steps.detail: The game is played on a grid that's 3x3.
Both player will can choose symbols (X or O), both player cannot be the same symbols.
Each player will take turns filling in empty spaces in the grid.
The first player to get 3 of their symbol in a row (up, down, across, or diagonally) is the winner.
If all squares are full and no player has 3 symbols in a row, the game is over and ends in a draw.
